data.name: Cemetery Brokerage, LLC
data.description: Cemetery Brokerage, LLC offers a platform and resources that help buy and sale unwanted cemetery properties. Most cemeteries do not purchase back property once sold however at Cemetery Brokerage solves that problem.

reviews_data.review_text:
The blessing I received from Avanti for my Son’s burial was surely God sent! I lost my son to gun violence, 6-9-2025. The devastating news of losing my baby boy was more than I could handle. Mr. Avanti called my sister with an incredible burial, vault included at a beautiful site. We meet and there were no other words needed for me to purchase this burial site from him. Mr. Avanti made it quick and easy and for me it was very spiritual and comforting. I pray your success and many blessings to come. Thank you very much
Mr. Avanti for everything.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Mrs. Kettisha thank you for your sharing your experience. My heart goes out to you and your family and you will be in thoughts and prayers in the days to come. Thank you for choosing Cemetery Brokerage in your time of need!

reviews_data.review_text: I first met Avanti  during the planning of my niece’s burial. Avanti displayed a high level of professionalism and integrity throughout the entire process. He demonstrated knowledge around the burial procedures enabling him to thoroughly answer all of my questions. His personable manner and appropriate approach made this difficult labor of love bearable for me and my family. I highly recommend his services to anyone charged with burying a loved one.”  Ken McCrary
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Mr. Ken for allowing us at Cemetery Brokerage to serve you. We will praying for your strength in the days to come.

You are truly welcome Ms. Carol. Thank you for entrusting me with the burial of your mother. It’s an honor being inducted into the family and I’ll continue checking on you all in the days, months, and years to come.

reviews_data.review_text:
The sadness of saying goodbye to a loved one is very disheartening. Mr. Avanti made the process seem less. We were provided quality customer service in addition to your  patience and kindness. Thank you for providing a final resting place for our loved one.

Dr. Natasha Williams
reviews_data.owner_answer: Dr. Natasha Thank you and your organization for entrusting your family into our care. We are happy we got to serve and be a blessing to you all.

reviews_data.review_text: Avanti Cloyd has been an absolute pleasure to work with. He has been very professional and knowledgeable in handling the selling of my cemetery plot and has removed all my stress in what to do. I am so pleased to have found him.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for kind words Mrs. Pauline. It’s not everyday that someone lists 4 plots and a buyer is found the same day. A rare occasion indeed, nevertheless we are thrilled at your experience and happy we got to serve you.

reviews_data.review_text: Avanti Cloyd assisted me in finding burial plots, (at a reputable cemetery) way more affordable than I could have found or bargained for on my own. In my experience with Avanti, he was very knowledgeable of the service he rendered and he thoroughly walked me through the process of acquiring four (4) burial plots at no out of pocket cost to me. Avanti’s customer service was upfront, personable, and genuine. I would highly recommend him to anyone seeking pre-funeral planning assistance.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Mr. Leonard for your kind words and review. Before we ever created Cemetery Brokerage as a business you were the first person I assisted getting (4) plots from someone interested in selling. It was pleasure assisting you.

reviews_data.review_text: Avanti is a professional. My brother and I inherited burial plots from our parents. We met with Avanti and discussed our situation. He was very knowledge and professional in helping us. It was the easiest and quickest property transaction I have ever encountered. We told him what we wanted for the lots. He found a buyer and set up a meeting between the buyers, my brother and I. Avanti closed the deal. All this process happened within approximately 3 weeks. Thank you Avanti !!!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Mr. Jimmy for trusting me with your business. Cemetery plots don’t take very long to sell contrary to popular belief. I’m happy I got the privilege to serve you guys.

reviews_data.review_text: Impeccable Service! Avanti Cloyd is Christ in the earth! Destroying yokes and removing burdens for families and communities! Thank You for serving the family of Ambassador Ricky D. Floyd Sr. Ambassador Ricky was laid to rest Royally in the Beautiful “Garden of Apostles.”
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you so much for your kind words! We, at Cemetery Brokerage are truly humbled by your praise. We are dedicated to serving with love and care, and it means the world to us that you had such a positive experience. We are truly grateful for the opportunity to support the family of Ambassador Ricky D. Floyd Sr. and to honor his legacy. Your feedback is deeply appreciated, and we look forward to continuing to serve with excellence.

reviews_data.review_text: I don't know where to start with this review. This young man has been a blessing to me and my family in so many ways.  Avanti first entered into my family life when he helped assist with the burial of my son's ( DaVonta) first child Malachi. Then life has a wired way of repeating itself Avanti also helped me with the burial of my son ( DaVonta)  2 months later.. I was so dizzy.. I didn't know what to do or how the process worked. Avanti worked a miracle out for Us. When I signed the paperwork on that Tuesday I thought everything was covered.. But it wasn't..  I got a call on the Thursday's day before the wake and I had to come up with $5882 for the burial in less than 24 hours before the wake which was that Friday This young man saved the day. He located a family who was willing to sell their plots for half the cost of what we were going to pay at the funeral home. When I tell you God had a ram in the bush this was it.  I will tell you... You will be in GREAT hands with this young man. You will have a peace of mind.  No regrets but peace!
reviews_data.owner_answer: Ms. Kashina your family will forever be in my heart and also my prayers. I never imagined I’d meet someone burying their unborn child,create a bond with them, and have to bury them unexpectedly 2months later. This broke my heart as well and I am tremendously happy I was able to serve your family and lighten the load for you guys. This is the purpose of my business to help families like yours. I’m always a call away if you need anything.

reviews_data.review_text: Avanti was a great help in getting every part of my father’s funeral together. Trust worthy and easy to work with. Thanks bud we appreciate you.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Mr. Billy I appreciate you trusting me with acquiring the plots for your dad’s funeral. You, Your wife Amanda, and mom Mrs. Barbara will always be in my thoughts and prayers.

reviews_data.review_text: Thank You AVANTI, For your excellent service and helping me locate four plots at Memphis Funeral Home Cemetery on Germantown Parkway. Thank you for your honest Accommodations. I will definitely recommend your services. Thanks
reviews_data.owner_answer: Mr. Dennis it was my pleasure! I look forward to serving all those you send my way.

reviews_data.review_text: Avanti contacted us concerning purchasing our cemetery plots of which we weren’t going to use. The transfer of property went well and   Avanti was very professional and easy to make it all happen.Thanks for your help
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you Mr. Sam for your kind words. Thank you for listing your property with us. You had a great price so we bought it for own personal inventory. It was a pleasure doing business with you.

reviews_data.review_text: Pleasant experience. Avanti was very professional and very helpful.
reviews_data.owner_answer: Thank you for listing your plots with us. We have 1 of 2 sold. Based on our target market we expect the second plot to be sold within 3 months.

reviews_data.review_text: This young man really cares about your situation and you when your dealing with a loss.He is so very helpful! When we moved from one state to another we called for advice and we felt very comfortable following his suggestions! He explained what was going on and made us more at ease. Worked out just like he said it would!!
